title: Arcade Ezreal not unlocked after I boguht it.
body:
http://prntscr.com/hah45o not unlocked

http://prntscr.com/hah4j0 proof i purchased it

fix it

edit: now Rocket Girl Tristana. Same outcome, fix plz

replies.body: I double checked both your purchase history and collection, and both Arcade Ez and Rocket Girl Trist are sitting safely in your inventory. If you don't see them unlocked, refresh your client and try entering a custom game with those skins.
I checked again after a while, it took them quite a long time to be unlocked. It never happened to me before, is the client just slower nowadays?

Same problem here :/
Purchased Pulsefire Caitlyn, but it's not unlocked. However in the Purchase History, it does show. That's frustrating...
